movies.title: Aurore
movies.plot: The year is 1909. In the village of Sainte-Philomène de Fortierville, Marie-Anne Caron, wife to Télésphore Gagnon, gives birth to their second daughter, Aurore. The child grows up in a loving and happy family, but in 1918 her mother dies of tuberculosis. Shortly after, Télésphore Gagnon decides to remarry, having fallen under the spell of his beautiful cousin, Marie-Anne Houde. Marie-Anne is not the devoted stepmother everyone takes her to be, however. Following the death of Aurore, a coroner's inquest reveals that the young girl had died of blood poisoning, brought on by the horrific abuse she suffered at the hands of her stepmother. The sensational trial which followed these revelations had a profound and lasting impact on Québec society. Aurore depicts an almost-forgotten period and social milieu of Québec's history, finally giving voice to those who, at the time, knew what was going on but preferred to remain silent.
movies.simplePlot: After the sudden death of her mother, Aurore Gagnon is abused by her disturbed step-mother as her town remains in the silence followed by her death. Based on a true story.

biography.bio: Marianne Fortier was born on November 2, 1993 in Québec, Québec, Canada. She is an actress, known for Mommy Is at the Hairdresser's (2008), Aurore (2005) and Reflexions (2012).
biography.name: Marianne Fortier

biography.bio: Serge Postigo was born on November 14, 1968 in Agen, France. He is an actor, known for Aurore (2005), Ma vie en cinémascope (2004) and Duo (2006).
biography.name: Serge Postigo

biography.bio: Hélène Bourgeois Leclerc was born in 1974 in Chicoutimi, Québec, Canada. She is known for her work on Les Bougon: C'est aussi ça la vie (2004), Mauvais Karma (2010) and The Trotsky (2009).
biography.name: Hélène Bourgeois Leclerc

biography.bio: Yves Jacques was born on May 10, 1956 in Québec, Canada. He is an actor, known for Aviator (2004), The Barbarian Invasions (2003) and Laurence Anyways (2012).
biography.name: Yves Jacques

biography.bio: Rémy Girard was born on August 10, 1950 in Jonquière, Quebec, Canada. He is an actor, known for The Barbarian Invasions (2003), Incendies (2010) and Les Bougon: C'est aussi ça la vie (2004).
biography.name: Rémy Girard

biography.bio: Stéphanie Lapointe was born on March 26, 1984. She is an actress, known for Liverpool (2012), Aurore (2005) and La peur de l'eau (2011).
biography.name: Stéphanie Lapointe

biography.bio: Sarah-Jeanne Labrosse was born on the 16th of August 1991 in Montreal, Quebec. Sarah-Jeanne was raised in both English language and French language as her father is an English-speaker and her mother is french-speaker. She started acting at the age of 7. She is the recipient of two Karv Awards in 2015, one for "Best Interpretation in a Youth Series" in Le Chalet and the second for "Personality of the year". She is also recipient of a Artis Awards for "Best Interpretation in a Youth Series" in 2016 and also was the youngest to be nominated "Personality of the year" for an Artis Awards. Labrosse made her American television debut in 2007 in Human Trafficking as Annie Gray, and then on big screen in Eastern Promises as Tatiana where she was directed by David Cronenberg. Between 2009 and 2015 she had stopped working in English because her work schedule in french didn't allow it. She is known for Bon cop Bad cop, 15/love, Eastern Promises, Starbuck, Unité 9, Yamaska, Le Chalet and Les Pays d'en Haut.
biography.name: Sarah-Jeanne Labrosse

biography.bio: Alice Morel-Michaud is an actress, known for The Pee-Wee 3D: The Winter That Changed My Life (2012), Trafic d'innocence (2005) and Aurore (2005).
biography.name: Alice Morel-Michaud

biography.bio: Michel Forget was born on February 27, 1942. He is an actor, known for The Woman Who Drinks (2001), The Last Chapter (2002) and Ma Vie en Rose (1997).
biography.name: Michel Forget

biography.bio: Monique Spaziani was born on December 16, 1957. She is an actress, known for I Killed My Mother (2009), Les portes tournantes (1988) and Laurence Anyways (2012).
biography.name: Monique Spaziani

biography.bio: Francine Ruel was born on April 14, 1948 in Quebec City, Quebec, Canada. She is an actress and writer, known for Monsieur Lazhar (2011), L'affaire Dumont (2012) and Aurore (2005).
biography.name: Francine Ruel

biography.bio: Born in Chicoutimi, Québec. Michel began is artistic carreer in 1982 as an amateur comedian. In 1983, he became a successfull stand-up comic (which he still is), then went on to make his first movie in 1990 : The Comic Book Christmas Caper (1990).
biography.name: Michel Barrette

biography.bio: Luc Senay was born on November 26, 1958. He is an actor, known for Tu Dors Nicole (2014), Father and Guns (2009) and The 3 L'il Pigs (2007).
biography.name: Luc Senay

biography.bio: Gaston Lepage was born on February 24, 1949. He is an actor, known for The Barbarian Invasions (2003), Coteau Rouge (2011) and Being at Home with Claude (1992).
biography.name: Gaston Lepage

biography.bio: Alain Boucher is an actor, known for The Rocket (2005), Aurore (2005) and Funkytown (2011).
biography.name: Alain Boucher
